Write the medicine name in the space shown in the picture. After that, if you click on Search, it will show you the corresponding drugs.
Another way is to click on "Filter". In that, you can select and filter the drugs you want from the drugs grouped according to the disease, or you can also filter by selecting and filtering by the beginning of the drug.

HelpData.heading: What can I do if I run out of the medicine I want?

instructions.text: Go to the page about the medicine you want. You can read above how to find the medicine you want.

If it shows "out of stock" in the quantity area, please click on "compare with the closest drug" below.
We will show you the medicine in the shop with the ingredients.
If you want to know for sure about the medicine, if you click on "Look" and you will go to the page written about the medicine.

HelpData.heading: How to use the medicine shopping list?

instructions.text: Go to the page about the medicine you want. You can read above how to find the medicine you want.
In the "amount" field, increase the amount with "+" or decrease with "-" and select the amount you want.

If so, please click on "add medicine shopping list".
After clicking ‚Äú‚Äù Click on A drug shopping list will appear. The name of the medicine I added You will see the quantity and price. If you change your mind and want to change the amount, you can increase it with "+" and decrease it with "-".
If you want to remove an added drug from the list, reduce the amount to zero. Then the price will change to 0. Or, 'Click to remove from the list.'
If you want to add a new drug to the drug shopping list ‚Äú‚Äù Click on Then step (1) above, (2), (3) If you do it again, a new drug will be added to the list.
Go to the shopping list. Read above how to find the medicine you want and how to use the medicine shopping list.
If you have all the medicines you want in the medicine shopping list, please click "Continue".

If you select "Pick up", fill in "Name" and "Phone Number". Check the "Total Charges".
Choose between "Pay with Cash" and "Pay with Bizum". If you select "Pay in cash", you will have to pay in cash when you arrive at the store. If you select "Pay with Bizum", transfer the money to the specified account and enter the transfer receipt once by clicking "Upload". Then tell the name at the shop and take out the medicine.

If you select "Home Delivery", "Name", Please fill in "Phone Number" and "Home Address". Check "Home Delivery" and "Total Charges".

Select your favorite from "Cash" and "Bizum". If you select "Pay with cash", you will have to pay with cash when you arrive at the place where you took the medicine. If you select "Pay with Bizum", transfer the money to the specified account and enter the transfer receipt once by clicking "Upload". Then the ordered drugs will be delivered within a day.
